titleStmt.title: The 21. of August. 1643. Whereas the Committee for the Militia in the city of London by vertue of an ordinance of both houses of Parliament ... have power to command the shutting up of all shops ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
Committee for the Militia of London. aut

notesStmt.note: Title from caption and first lines of text.
Ordering business to cease and the Militia to march to the relief of Gloucester. -- Steele.
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries, London, England.
